attributes.comment:
As an adoptive parent, I believe an increase in orphan petitions is not necessary.
Already, because adoptions are taking longer and longer, most of us are required
to file TWICE because the approval is only good for 18 months. USCIS does not
have any sort of renewal system for I600/600A applications, so adoptive parents
are stuck paying the fee twice AND paying for fingerprints twice. No apparent
reason for that other than to make money. A person's fingerprints don't change.

I wholehearted disapprove of increasing fees at USCIS, particularly for orphan
petitions.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Adoptive Parent, Patti Urban
